text: Geoffrey Toseland (31 January 1931 – 16 May 2019) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. Toseland died on 16 May 2019, aged 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Kettering Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Kettering Town F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Geoff Toseland
